iscream 0.0.0.9000

Check that the required threads are available

Source: R/threads.R
check_thread_count.Rd

Check that the required threads are available

Usage

check_thread_count(
  n_threads,
  avail_threads = availableCores(),
  opt_set = FALSE
)

Arguments

n_threads

The number of threads to check availability for

avail_threads

The number of threads that are available on the system. Defaults to parallelly::availableCores()

opt_set

Whether the iscream.threads options is set

Value

n_threads if the requested number of threads are available and stops if not
